San_Mateo.Rancho Feliz:
Rancho Feliz was a 4,448-acre (18.00 km2) Mexican land grant in present day San Mateo County, California given in 1844 by Governor Manuel Micheltorena to Domingo Feliz. The grant extended north from Rancho Cañada de Raymundo along the San Andreas Valley, west of San Andreas Lake up to Sweeney Ridge.


== History ==
Domingo Feliz (1820–??), born in San Francisco, received the one square league grant in 1844.
